Question: This person said: "My true glory is not to have won 40 battles...Waterloo will erase the memory of so many victories. ..
Hints: This person's own account was: "The most terrible of all my battles was the one before Moscow.
Joséphine had lovers, including a Hussar lieutenant, Hippolyte Charles, during this person's Italian campaign.
This person has become a worldwide cultural icon who symbolises military genius and political power.
